_sText:
ALSO check out MG_INVISIBLEMEN, http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/144311

Objective:

General- Kill the opposite team or survive for 3 minutes, Once the helicopter comes get inside to avoid dieing by the poison bomb.
Pick up ammo from the ammo crates.


T's- YOU ARE COMPLETELY INVISIBLE, Your objective is to kill all the CT's before they can escape. You are faster and can jump higher than the CT's this is based on the amount of the ct's though.If you survive for 3minutes get to the helicopter. Once you die you auto join CT.

CT's When you spawn enter the room to your side and select and pick up a weapon. After doing so go out into the playing field and try to survive or kill the invisible man. If you survive for 3minutes get to the helicopter. Once you kill the invisibleman a new invisibleman will be chosen from a random alive CT.



EDIT IN Final Version
Disallowing flashlight via server command MP_flashlight 0



Watch video on how to play:
